name: CaptainFreezy
description:
Help Captain Freezy, a 2D adventurer who fights different types of enemies with cool mechanics in 10 different waves, and every wave represents the best theme from every 10 weeks of the #Weeklygamejam!

Captain Freezy is a snowman who shoots snowballs and his goal is to kill 100 enemies! The game will get harder and harder by progressing in it! The enemies who will try to kill him by increasing his temperature with fireballs which will lead him to death if it reaches 100!
